textTemplates.name: BeforeyouBeginTextTemplate
textTemplates.text:
This form is used to initiate/request a Travel Request.


Each employee create a travel request with details concerning each leg of his/her itinerary. Once submitted his/her manager will review and approve / reject each request. The manager may add additional comments regarding their decision. The parameters of this will include:


  • Request Name
  • Description of travel and reason
  • Originating location
  • Final Destination location
  • Details for each leg of the trip

textTemplates.name: TeleworkRequestReview
textTemplates.text:
General

Employee Name: {!Get_Employee_User_Record.Name}

Supervisor: {!Get_Supervisor_Record.Name}


Self Certification

Status: Complete


Telework Plan

Telework Request Type: {!TeleworkAgreement.Type_of_Telework__c}

Alternate Work Site: {!TeleworkAgreement.Alternate_Work_Site_Type__c}


Reasonable Accommodations

N/A


Equipment Request

None

textTemplates.name: TeleworkSelfCertificationTextTemplate
textTemplates.text:
As a Government of the Future Teleworker, I certify that I have reviewed and agree to comply with all of the terms and conditions listed in the Telework Policy, Telework Guidelines, this Telework Agreement and all other terms and conditions of employment. This includes all provisions within Government of the Future Human Resources Policy #xxx: Standards of Conduct and Ethics in Government.


  • I agree to spend the time approved for telework performing the assigned duties and responsibilities of my position.
  • I agree to maintain contact with my work unit, as appropriate, to successfully perform my assigned duties and responsibilities.
  • I agree to contact my manager/supervisor to request prior approval for leave.
  • I agree to maintain a safe telework environment that is conducive to productivity.
  • Arrangements have been made for dependent care.
  • Non-business-related activity will be kept to a minimum.
  • I agree to immediately report to my manager/supervisor, IT, and the Agency Telework Coordinator any security issue that arise at my telework site.
  • I understand that the Government of the Future is not liable for any damages to my personal or real property, while I am performing official duties at my telework site.
  • I agree to immediately report to my manager/supervisor any work-related injuries that occur, while teleworking in my designated workspace.
  • I understand that the sole purpose of this agreement is to regulate telework and that it does not constitute a contract of employment.
  • I understand that telework is voluntary and is not an employee right.
